org.grouplens.lenskit.predict.ordrec

Class OrdRecRatingPredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractRatingPredictor
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.predict.ordrec.OrdRecRatingPredictor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingPredictor

    public class OrdRecRatingPredictor
extends AbstractRatingPredictor
    Rating predictor using OrdRec to map scores to ratings. The model views user feedback as ordinal. The framework is based on a pointwise (rather than pairwise) ordinal approach, it can wrap existing CF methods, and upgrade them into being able to tackle ordinal feedback. The implementation is based on Koren's paper:
    Since:
    2.1

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        public void predict(long uid,
                    @Nonnull
                    MutableSparseVector predictions)
        Description copied from interface: RatingPredictor
        Predict for items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items whose predictions are requested, and the predict method sets the values for each item to its predict (or unsets it, if no prediction can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        uid - The user ID.
        predictions - The prediction output vector. Its key domain is the items to score.
